name: Leveron Space
description: You are required to go into battle against huge enemy forces, using your wit you must engage and defeat huge enemy forces. This 3D first person space combat role will require you to protect civilians, remove enemy threats and clear the way for you capital ships to annihilate the enemy forces.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: i3 4160 3.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 650 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: i7 4790k 4.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 780 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
